contributionDescription: My contribution is that I have made transactions on the Optimism Network. Apart from that, I have also followed the Optimism social media account because I really like the Optimism Network. Apart from the cheap fees, the Optimism Network is also good for making transactions.
impactDescription: The impact of my contribution is carrying out transactions on the Optimism Network. I think that is one contribution, apart from that, I also often support it by following and sharing news from Optimism.Hopefully Optimism is more advanced and can compete with big projects
pwFlaggedReason: This application should be flagged for violating rule 10. The applicant just making transactions on the Optimism Network and following its social media does not count as a contribution.
